import BookItem from '../Components/BookItem'; import Slider from '../Components/Slider'; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchAllBooks } from "../../redux/Slices/bookSlice"; export default function Homepage() { let navigate = useNavigate(); const { book, pending, error, error_message, success_message } = useSelector((state) => state.book); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const [booksToShow, setbooksToShow] = useState(book); console.log(booksToShow); const handleShowMoreBooks = () => { setPage((prevValue) => prevValue + 1); setbooksToShow((prevValue) => prevValue.concat(book)); }; useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchAllBooks(page)); }, [page]); return ( <>
{booksToShow.map((bookItem)=>{ return })}
); }
